issuer.name: Northeastern University (NU)
issuer.description: Founded in 1898, we’re renowned for our experiential learning model, high-impact research, deep partnerships, and worldwide reach. From day one we’ve pursued innovative ways of teaching and research that place a premium on experience and engagement with the world. Today, our signature approach erases traditional boundaries, empowering not only students, but faculty, alumni, partners, and innovators to solve problems and pursue impact.

name: Foundations of Responsible AI Learning
description: Earners of this badge completed a six-week course introducing AI concepts through the lens of ethical and responsible practice. Designed for learners from diverse backgrounds, the course covered principles of responsible AI, including regulatory considerations, and analyzed how AI can enhance business strategies. Through the lens of human-centered AI, this course provided insights into how to integrate human perspectives into AI design. Badge earners engaged with readings, videos, and weekly quizzes to gain a foundation in AI, preparing themselves for applying AI in their studies or careers in various industries.

criteria.narrative:
- Complete the 6-week, online-asynchronous, non-credit course, _Foundations of Responsible AI_.
- View all course materials.
- Complete all weekly quizzes.
